name: New York City Criminal Case 3D
description:
New York City Criminal Case 3D
He there you low life thug are you done with car theft games, are you ready to own New York? Download New York City Criminal Case 3D today and fight your way to the top of the criminal underworld of this major crime city. New York City Criminal Case 3D offers you loads of different gameplay types. As a low time thief in a big city there are different ways to earn your money.


Ready to start earning your money on the streets of crime?
You can do steal car missions where you get a job from a big time old school corrupt police officer. Or choose to the package delivery mission where you need to secure a priceless package for a friend and deliver this to the drop off point. Once you earned enough money you can think about hiring yourself out as a true hit man. In the kill target missions you need to take care of someone that is getting on the nerves of a big time grand gangster. These real city gangsters you don’t wanna mess with. The kill frenzy mission is one of the hardest missions to play, two rival gangs are in war and you get hired to even the odds. Survival is the key to getting your reward. If you have a fast ride bought in the garage, you can take on sprint race missions in New York City Criminal Case 3D. Race your way through the streets of new york see big building like the empire state building drive on the asphalt off time square and make sure you get through all the checkpoints in time.


If you love crime games, you would love to become a city gangster in New York City Criminal Case 3D
Become on of the most dangerous city gangsters in this real gangster game. Take out thugs, steal cars earn money that's what the game is all about.


New York City Criminal Case 3D 3D Crime City Games Features
▶ Earn money, earn rides, earn guns and blast your way through New York
▶ Big size 3D world in this free roaming sandbox game! Explore the streets of crime today
▶ Loads of different mission types, steal car, package delivery, kill target, kill frenzy and sprint race.
▶ Are you the able to become the big time grand gangster on the streets of crime?


You like what VascoGames is all about, you wanne see more new and upcoming games, then follow us on one of the next social media channels
